name: Public Health Action Network
description: Nonprofit organization aiming to safeguard public health by improving air quality, promoting evidence-based COVID-19 prevention strategies, and empowering communities.

name: Covid Advocacy Initiative
description: Advocacy group working to connect COVID advocates at the local, state, and national level and taking action to prevent COVID spread & save lives.

name: COVID Meetups
description: A free service to find individuals, families and local businesses/services who take COVID precautions in your area.

name: Resist COVID Eugenics
description: Ongoing project highlighting resources created from collective care and resistance to eugenics and fascism. It is currently US centric.
